product_name: Arc'teryx A2B Commuter Bike Jacket - Women's
long_description: Pedaling to work in iffy weather? Wear the women's Arc'teryx A2B Commuter Bike Jacket. This urban-chic soft shell resists rain and wind, and lets you choose whether to expose the reflective trim. Soft-shell polyester fabric offers comfortable stretch for everyday living and urban commutes. Center-front zipper curves asymmetrically to the high, neck-protecting collar. Ergonomic arm articulation frees up your cycling mobility. Cuffs fold down to reveal reflective bands; flip cuffs up to hide the bands once you're at your destination. Zippered hand pockets and 1 zippered back pocket; gel Arc'teryx logo on upper back. Arc'teryx A2B Commuter Bike Jacket for women features a trim fit.
short_description: Pedaling to work in iffy weather? Wear the women's Arc'teryx A2B Commuter Bike Jacket. This urban-chic soft shell resists rain and wind, and lets you choose whether to expose the reflective trim.
